app.name: Glizi
app.long_description: Easily integrate Zendesk with your Gitlab instance in order to view and create issues
app.installation_instructions: Install, configure your gitlab instance URL, input your automation user credentials.

gitlabApiUrl.label: Gitlab API URL
gitlabApiUrl.helpText: The URL to the gitlab API including the protocol. E.g.:'https://gitlab.your-company.com/api/v4/'

gitlabToken.label: Gitlab Token
gitlabToken.helpText: The access token for the gitlab user you want to use as the integration. It must have read and write API access.

gitlabGroupId.label: Gitlab Group ID
gitlabGroupId.helpText: This should be the ID number of your gitlab group/organization.

gitlabTypeLabel.label: Type Label
gitlabTypeLabel.helpText: Start of the type label. Defaults to 'Type::'.

gitlabPriorityLabel.label: Priority Label
gitlabPriorityLabel.helpText: Start of the priority label. Defaults to 'Priority::'.

gitlabExcludeTypeLabels.label: Excluded Types
gitlabExcludeTypeLabels.helpText: Type labels to exclude (ommiting the scope). E.g.: 'Vulnerability,Internal' rather than 'Type::Vulnerability,Type::Internal'.

gitlabExcludePriorityLabels.label: Excluded Priorities
gitlabExcludePriorityLabels.helpText: Priority labels to exclude (ommiting the scope). E.g.: 'Highest,Lowest' rather than 'Priority::Highest,Priority::Lowest'.

gitlabPriorityOrder.label: Priority Options Order
gitlabPriorityOrder.helpText: Order of appearance for priority options in dropdowns. E.g.: 'Low,Normal,High'

gitlabIncludeProjects.label: Included Projects
gitlabIncludeProjects.helpText: Comma-separated list of project IDs to include. You can include a pretty name using a colon. E.g.: 19:My Pretty Project,80:Another Project

gitlabExcludeProjects.label: Excluded Projects
gitlabExcludeProjects.helpText: Comma-separated list of project IDs to exclude.
